title: Rename HTML document title to Dini GC

requirements.summary: Change the HTML document <title> shown in the browser tab to "Dini GC" without altering URLs, routing, or links.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document <title> is "Dini GC" (replacing "Anonymous Global Chat Website").
After refresh, the browser tab title shows "Dini GC".
No routing, domain, or link/URL text is changed as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the <title> text from "Anonymous Global Chat Website" to "Dini GC" only; do not change any URLs, routing, script src, or other link text.
